Reviews.Title: The Fastest Galaxy S3 On the Market!!
Reviews.Author: Im Joobin "F13"
Reviews.Content: Comes with Exynos 1.4 GHz Quad Core CPU and 2GB RAM.This is the fastest Galaxy S3 on the market!!!Even faster than North American version Galaxy S3 (Dual Core Snapdragon 1.5 GHz) with 2GB RAM.But beware... the 4G LTE frequencies are not compatible with North American 4G LTE standard...

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: Abhijeet Mirjolkar
Reviews.Content: Being an international model, some other languages is set in it.even after changing the language setting, basic language remains same.Rest everything is cool.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Isabella
Reviews.Content: The best choice that I had when I decide to buy a new cellphone. Beutiful and easy to play. Ariived on time and I suggest the sender.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous phone!
Reviews.Author: Britta Derington
Reviews.Content: I was a bit nervous when I took the plunge and bought my first smartphone.  Not only did I buy it online, but the unlocked, international version.  Reason is, I go to Europe every summer and wanted to be able to swap sim cards and use it there.  The phone was loaded in French with only French instructions.  No problem, I switched language right away.  Downloaded user guide from the internet. The phone came with an adapter for the charger also.  I decided to use Net10 as my phone,text and data provider.  Bought a sim card kit (Best Buy,Target) and it comes with the option to use either AT&T; or T-Mobile.  This phone uses the micro sim card which was included in this kit.  Inserted the sim card and followed the instruction to activate it and port over my cell phone number from Verizon.  After a couple of hours, I got a text message that I was set to go!  It was that easy!  Love my phone, love my service!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy S III i9305 White 4G/LTE Factory Unlocked International
Reviews.Author: Mplentar
Reviews.Content: the GS3 was ORIGINAL and awesome just i could not fit the sim card it probably needs a micro sim but it doesn't said that

Reviews.Title: Good cel But chinese standard
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This cel is awesone. Fast reliable and beautiful.The problem is that.they import this phone from china and dont even bother to change the charger to a western standard...

Reviews.Title: Reliable seller. phone is exactly as described!!
Reviews.Author: Narodi
Reviews.Content: The phone came in an unsealed original Samsung package (already a good sign!!)As advertised - This is an International, factory unlocked I9305 with 4G option and 2GB RAM.the Only thing is that the charger was not compatible for my country. The seller even included an adapter for US form, but I'm not from the US.That's nothing to worry, because the USB can be plugged anywhere to charge and chargers are easy to find.Still applause to the seller for thinking of that :)Also, before buying seller answered my questions via email fast the thoroughly.I'm using it for a week now, and everything works perfectly. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Dee Bee
Reviews.Content: I bought the i9305 from FGS Trading. Good customer service via e-mail, I had a concern before the order was shipped, they responded promptly. The phone came brand new, with the French language, I was able to get the language, date, time, and weather set-up for the US. Euro charger but they provided an adapter. Using the phone with a Straight Talk ATT SIM card that I bought from eBay. Works great. Thank you. Very nice.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Over all it is a good product and easy to use.  The reason I did not rate this phone 5 is, the battery drains out 80 % in a day of moderate use.Some of the apps such as Gmail and Goolge Navigation, take a lot of time to load and refresh.

Reviews.Title: Love the phone
Reviews.Author: M. Niss
Reviews.Content: very pleased with the phone. the only problem is that is spoke french when it arrived and has all kinds of french apps I am yet to get rid off.

Reviews.Title: Totally love it
Reviews.Author: James Osborne
Reviews.Content: The screen is bigger! You can extend the storage capacity by putting extra storage sd card! Good for men with bigger hand!

Reviews.Title: nice phone but not what I want
Reviews.Author: Jack W
Reviews.Content: A very good looking phone and does what it supposed to do. However, I was looking for a phone with Chinese language selectable option and this phone does not have it. Having the Chinese language is a must for me; unfortunately...., phone is currently stored in the packaging that it came in on - unused. will try to sell it as soon as I can and get another (brand) that will give me what I want.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE PHONE
Reviews.Author: Doris
Reviews.Content: Finally, I took it with me in the Philippines, LOVE the phone. NO problems, fast internet. Glad I bought this phone. Fast shipping too

Reviews.Title: curious about buying this phone on black friday,,,,please help me decide
Reviews.Author: Christopher B.
Reviews.Content: can this phone use any sim card? is it safe to buy from global mobiles? am i getting a phone with a set of french or chinese apps that i cant delete?

Reviews.Title: Good phone but can not use T-mobile 3G and 4G
Reviews.Author: samsung usrt
Reviews.Content: I am a Little disappoint about the phone which can not search T-mobile 3G and 4G network, only work in 2G.Who can tell me whats going on?

Reviews.Title: S3 GT-i9305(i9305) 4G Marble White
Reviews.Author: Ramesh Pappu
Reviews.Content: OS: Jelly Bean 4.1.2Sim Type: MicroFM Radio: NoRAM: 2GBFollow this link for useful information from t-mobile about 4G LTE[...]

Reviews.Title: the best of the bunch
Reviews.Author: Charlie Truong "Sports geek"
Reviews.Content: so many features, it took me a week to learn them all. wish delivery was faster though.  all i can say is... love it love it love it

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Uldrich
Reviews.Content: After waiting for some shipping lag, I got this great smartphone. Its extremely slick and easy to use. The screen is super clear and has nice colors. Plus the quad core gives so much processing power you notice no delay I operating several apps at a time. Definitely recommend it

Reviews.Title: The best smartphone. I'm sure
Reviews.Author: Adriano Cruz Araujo "Araujo, Adriano"
Reviews.Content: The samsung galaxy S3 with 2Gb of RAM memory is amazing!!In future,  I'll move to Samsung galaxy S4. :)

Reviews.Title: Perfect cell phone
Reviews.Author: Glauco
Reviews.Content: I just love Samsung phones and android. I've had Samsung Galaxy S 1, 2 and 3. I sold my old S3 to buy the S4, but it wasn't avaible when I was in US, so I bought the LTE version. I won't write about android because there are a bunch of other reviews out there. But this phone is superb. the 2GB of RAM does make a difference. As I said, I had the 3G version of the S3 and it wasn't this fast. Besides, it seems the battery lasts longer then the 3G version. If you plan to but the S3, this is the one!

Reviews.Title: Poor Battery
Reviews.Author: Dinesh Raichandani
Reviews.Content: Great phone but have a big problem with battery. Battery is not charging. Phone is on charging for over 12 hrs still not charged completely.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: HERMANN
Reviews.Content: Very good! Several features and a good price! Availability for use in any situation. None against, due to the product being quality.

Reviews.Title: galaxy s 3
Reviews.Author: Mujib Afzali
Reviews.Content: i notice that 3g is more faster then 4g on downloading from internet. it is good but the chrgin sucks.

Reviews.Title: SIII - a wonderful smart phone
Reviews.Author: StandforTruth "Stand for What is Right"
Reviews.Content: I like this phone a lot. It serves so many purposes, you can't even use them all at once. Nice.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto, lo solicitado
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: es un teléfono con tecnología moderna que va acorde con los avances en los nuevos programas y funciones o bondades que ofrece para el trabajo y lo particular
